Package path_simulation

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • path_simulation.Grid

  • class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    The Grid has a matrix of Points, based on the number of rows and columns of the PathSimulation

        Update cost for Special Cost edges

        x1 - Initial column of Special Cost Zone

        x2 - Final column of Special Cost Zone
        y2 - Final row of Special Cost Zone

               int y,
               int direction,
               int cost)
        Change cost of an Edge
        Parameters:
        x - Column
        y - Row
        direction - Which edge to change [0 - nort; 1 - west; 2 - south; 3 - east]
        cost - Cost of Edge
